item.title: Joint Economic Forecast Spring 2019: Significant cooling of the economy - political risks high
March 2019: Global economy on the decline
item.description: Summary The pace of global economic expansion continued to decline at the beginning of this year. The slowdown continued in the manufacturing sector in particular, which had already lost momentum in the past year. In the final quarter of the year, overall economic production expanded at a somewhat slower pace, particularly in the two major economies USA and China. In the Euro Area, it rose at the same rate as in the previous quarter.
